item.title: Field Trip not working properly?
item.content:encoded: I have Aviator Goggles however I keep failing the "shades" portion of this mission which according to the wiki, I should be passing. Is anyone else encountering this problem or is it a bug/glitch or am I doing something wrong? Any help is appreciated.
